name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with over 10 years of experience in deploying and managing cloud-native solutions across **AWS** and **Google Cloud Services**. Proficient in **Docker** and **Kubernetes** orchestration for efficient system management. Strong background in **Python**, along with experience in database management using **MS SQL Server**, **Oracle**, and **PostgreSQL**. Skilled in designing **RESTful APIs** and creating robust backend architectures on **Microsoft Windows Server**, **Linux**, **HPUX**, **AIX**, and **z/OS** platforms. Exceptional problem-solving abilities, combined with outstanding communication and presentation skills, ensuring effective team collaboration and successful project management. Proven history of contributing to key strategic projects with top-tier organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
